bullets.bullet: Managed large-scale, cross-functional R&D projects across APAC and Europe, ensuring timely delivery, quality standards, and proper documentation through all project phases (initiation, planning, execution, monitoring, closure).
Developed and maintained project charters, management plans, and KPI dashboards, overseeing scope, schedule, cost, quality, risk, and stakeholder engagement for HW/SW product launches.
Facilitated recurring program updates, risk/issue reviews, and decision tracking with global stakeholders, improving alignment and execution speed for complex projects.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams (engineering, QA, validation) and external partners to align integration readiness, resolve HW/SW integration issues, and prepare systems for OEM evaluation.
Transformed OEM stakeholder requirements and field feedback into actionable product refinements, driving pilot adoption and optimizing end-to-end user experience.
Orchestrated technical validation and delivery cadence for safety-critical product milestones, ensuring cross-functional alignment and on-time pilot launches.
Utilized Agile methodologies (Jira, sprint cadence, milestone planning) and tools (Notion, DeepSpeed) to manage release readiness, rollout planning, and technical triage for AI/ML-driven products.
